Conjuration 8

Queen of Elemental Air
Ritual
A5
spell id [id]: 831
effect number [effect_number]: 89
damage [damage]: 7
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 50A
Ritual Summon Unique Commander:#563 “Aella“ - Queen of Storms,
#911 “Thuella“ - Queen of Thunder,
#912 “Nephele“ - Queen of Clouds
The caster calls on the supernatural forces of the sky itself and summons one of the three Queens of Elemental Air. The Queens are masters of Air magic, can fly and are ethereal in nature.
